import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

[4,3,2,1]], columns=["A","B","C","D"],index=["E", "F"])

plt.plot(df)

title: 01 week01
text:
Print your full name here to replace “Hello World!” 打印姓名

print("Hello World!")

Hello World!


view/hide line numbers in jupyter notebook 显示/隐藏行数
click View -> click Toggle Line Numbers 点击View -> 点击Toggle Line Numbers

# This is line #5   这是第5行

the order of executing block changes results jupyter notebook 中未运行的代码块对后面代码块无影响

import numpy as np


print(np.__version__)

1.26.0


the order of executing block changes results jupyter notebook 代码运行顺序对结果有影响

a=5


print(a)

5



a=6

title: 00 installation
text:
1. Installation
install.bat
@echo off
REM 声明采用UTF-8编码
chcp 65001
ECHO.
TITLE [环境安装]
color 70
@REM start/wait python-3.7.8-amd64.exe /passive PrependPath=1
@REM pause
call python -m venv venv
call dir
pause
call venv\Scripts\activate
call python -m pip install --upgrade pip
call pip3 --trusted-host pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple pandas
call pip3 --trusted-host pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple jupyter
call pip3 list
call cmd

@REM pause
chcp 65001 : encoding in UTF-8 to present Chinese replace “python-3.7.8-amd64.exe” with your own python installation file /passive PrependPath=1 : sliencely extend the maximum length of path python -m venv venv : create a virtual environment
install pandas and jupyter for now


2. Execution
I have provided 2 simple .bat file for activate the virtual environment and run jupyter notebook venv.bat
@echo off
REM 声明采用UTF-8编码
chcp 65001
ECHO.
TITLE [环境安装]
color 70

call venv\Scripts\activate
echo [35mjupyter notebook stop[0m
call cmd


@REM pause
the command ‘jupyter notebook stop’ is highlighted here this command could be used in this activated environment to stop the local sever of jupyter
run jupyter notebook.bat
@echo off
REM 声明采用UTF-8编码
chcp 65001
ECHO.
TITLE [运行]
color 70

call venv\Scripts\activate
call jupyter notebook

@REM pause
Simplely double click this file to run jupyter notebook


3. Possible Problems
there are two possible 1. jupyter notebook Bad file descriptor check the solution from this link (It’s in Chinese) 2. the default browser won’t prompt check the solution from this link (It’s in Chinese)
